default: (a)一把{@filter 军用武器|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}和一面{@item 盾牌|phb} 或 (b)二把{@filter 军用武器|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}
(a)五把{@item 标枪|phb} 或 (b)任意一把{@filter 简易近战武器|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon;melee weapon=&}
(a)一套{@item 祭司套装|phb} 或 (b)一套{@item 探索者套装|phb}
一件{@item 锁子甲|phb}和一个{@item 圣徽|phb}

classFeatures.name: 神圣感知
entries: 强大的邪恶对你来说就像是令人作呕的臭气，而强大的善良在你的耳中就如同仙乐般鸣响。以一个动作，你可以扩张你的意识以侦测这类力量。直到你的下个回合结束前，你知晓任何距离你60呎内，且未处于全掩护的天界生物、邪魔、或不死生物的位置。你知晓被你感知到的存在的种类（天界生物、邪魔、或不死生物），但无法知晓它的身分（例如吸血鬼伯爵，斯特拉德．冯．扎洛维奇）。在同样的范围内，你也可以侦测到任何被像是{@spell 圣居}法术给祝圣或亵渎的场所或物体。
你可以使用这个能力的次数等同于1+你的魅力调整值。当你完成一次长休，你恢复所有你花费掉的次数。

classFeatures.name: 圣疗
entries: 你祝福的碰触可以医治伤口。你拥有一个治疗能量池，会在你每次长休后补满。借由治疗能量池，你可以回复总共等同于你圣骑士等级 x 5的生命值。
以一个动作，你可以触碰一个生物并汲取治疗池中的能量以让该生物回复一定数量的生命值，最多等同于你治疗池中剩余的数量。
或者，你可以消耗你治疗池中的5点生命值，以治疗或中和一个正影响目标的疾病或毒素。你可以使用一次圣疗治疗复数个疾病并中和复数个毒素，但你必须为各疾病和毒素分别支付治疗池中的生命值。
这个能力对不死生物和构装体没有任何效果。

classFeatures.name: 至圣斩
entries: 从2级开始，当你使用一次近战武器攻击命中一个生物，除了武器伤害以外，你可以消耗一个法术位以对目标造成额外的光耀伤害。这个额外伤害在消耗1环法术位时为{@dice 2d8}点，高于一环的法术位则每环再加上{@dice 1d8}点伤害，最高至{@dice 5d8}。若目标为不死生物或邪魔，则伤害再增加{@dice 1d8}点，最高至{@dice 6d8}。

classFeatures.name: 战斗风格
entries: 在2级时，你采用一种特殊的战斗风格以做为你的专业。从下列选项中选择一种。你不能获得相同的战斗风格选项超过一次，即使你有机会再选择它也一样。

entries.name: 近身射手
entries: 当你在距离一个敌意生物5呎以内时进行一次远程攻击，你在该攻击检定中并不会具有劣势。你的远程攻击忽略距离你30呎内目标的半掩护和四分之三掩护。你在远程攻击的攻击检定中获得+1加值。

entries.name: 防御
entries: 当你穿戴护甲时，你的AC获得+1加值。

entries.name: 决斗
entries: 当你单手持用一把近战武器，且没有持用其他武器时，你在使用该武器所进行的伤害骰中获得+2加值。

entries.name: 巨武战斗
entries: 当你在使用一把以双手持用的近战武器所进行攻击的伤害骰中骰出了1或2的结果，你可以重骰该骰，且必须使用新的掷骰结果，即使其结果仍然是1或2。该武器必须具有双手或可双手属性才能让你获得这个好处。

entries.name: 水手
entries: 只要你未穿戴重甲或使用盾牌，你就拥有等同于你正常移动速度的游泳速度和攀爬速度，且你的AC获得+1加值。

entries.name: 守护
entries: 当一个你所能看见的生物攻击一个距离你5呎内你以外的目标，你可以使用你的反应以让该攻击检定承受劣势。你必须持握一面盾牌。

entries.name: 坑道斗士
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你可以进入防御架式并持续直到你的下个回合开始。当你处于防御架式时，你可以进行借机攻击而无需使用你的反应，且你可以处于你触及范围内的生物移动超过5呎时使用你的反应对它进行一次近战攻击。

classFeatures.name: 施法
entries: 从2级起，你学会了如牧师一般透过冥想和祈祷利用神圣魔法。请参阅{@book 第十章|PHB|10}以了解关于施法的规则，以及第十一章以查阅{@filter 圣骑士法术列表|spells|class=paladin}。

entries.name: 准备及施放法术
entries: 圣骑士表中显示了你有多少个法术位可以用来施放你一环或更高环的{@filter 圣骑士法术|spells|class=paladin}。要施放其中一个这些法术，你必须消耗一个与该法术环阶相同或更高的法术位。你在完成一次长休后恢复所有你花费掉的法术位。
你准备一份你所能施放的圣骑士法术列表，从圣骑士法术列表中选择。当你这么做时，选择数量等同于你魅力调整值 + 你圣骑士等级的一半（向下取整）的圣骑士法术（最少一个法术）。这些法术的环阶都必须符合你所拥有法术位的环阶。
举例来说，如果你是一个5级的圣骑士，你拥有四个1环和二个2环的法术位。你的魅力为14，则你已准备法术的列表中可以包含总共四个1环或2环的法术。若你准备了1环法术{@spell 治疗伤势}，你可以使用1环和2环的法术位来施放它。施放法术并不会将它从你的准备法术列表中移除。
你可以在你完成一次长休时改变你的准备法术列表。准备一份新的圣骑士法术列表需要花费时间于祈祷和冥想：你需要为你列表上每个法术的每个环阶都花费至少1分钟的时间。

entries.name: 施法属性
entries: 因为你法术的能量源自于你信仰的强度，魅力是你施展圣骑士法术的施法属性。每当一个法术提及你的施法属性时，你将使用你的魅力。此外，当决定你圣骑士法术的豁免DC、以及使用圣骑士法术进行攻击检定时，你使用你的魅力调整值。

entries.name: 施法法器
entries: 你可以使用一个{@item 圣徽|phb}（第五章），来做为你施放圣骑士法术的法器。

classFeatures.name: 神性体魄
entries: 从3级起，在你体内涌动的神圣魔法使你免疫于疾病。

classFeatures.name: 神圣誓言
entries: 当你升至3级时，你立下永远做为圣骑士的神圣誓言。在此之前，你仅是处于准备阶段，投身于这条道途，但尚未立誓遵从它。现在，你从可选的圣誓列表中选择一个。
你的选择将在3级、7级、15级、和20级时赋予你新的能力。这些能力包括了圣誓法术以及引导神力能力。

entries.name: 圣誓法术
entries: 每个圣誓都具有一张关联法术列表。你将在升至各圣誓说明中指定的圣骑士等级时获得这些法术。一旦你获得圣誓法术，你将永远视作已经准备了它，且它不会计入你每日可准备的法术数量中。
若你获得一个不在圣骑士法术列表上的圣誓法术，则该法术对你而言仍然视作圣骑士法术。

entries.name: 引导神力
entries: 你的圣誓允许你引导神圣能量以驱动魔法效果。每个由你的圣誓所提供的引导神力都会说明使用它的方式。
当你使用你的引导神力时，你选择要使用哪一个选项。你接着必须完成一次短休或长休后才能再使用你的引导神力。
某些引导神力的效果会需要豁免检定。当你使用本职业的这类效果时，其DC等同于你的圣骑士法术豁免DC。

entries.name: 背弃誓言
entries: 圣骑士尝试于使自己符合最高的道德标准，但即使是最具美德的圣骑士也会犯错。有时是因为正确的道路太过高不可攀，有时当下的情境迫使你在两害相权取其轻，而有时狂热的激情则会让圣骑士的违背了他或她的誓言。
背弃誓言的圣骑士通常会向相同信仰的牧师或相同教团的圣骑士寻求赦罪。圣骑士可能会花费一整晚守夜祈祷以做为他忏悔的证明，或者斋戒禁食以表示自我否定，或者采取一个快速或类似的克己举动。在执行认罪和饶恕的仪式后，圣骑士便重获纯洁。
若一个圣骑士蓄意地违背了他或她的誓言，且没有展现出任何悔过的迹象，后果可能会更加严重。根据DM的裁断，一个不知悔悟的圣骑士可能被迫放弃此职业而过继为另一个职业，或是采用记载于《地下城主指南》中的破誓圣骑士选项。

classFeatures.name: 属性值提升
entries: 当你在此职业升至4级时，你可以增加一项自选属性值2点，或着你可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。如同平常一样，你不能透过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。
如果你的DM允许使用专长的话，你也可以改为获得一个{@5etools 专长|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 额外攻击
entries: 从5级开始，每当你在你的回合采取{@action 攻击}动作，你可以攻击二次，而非一次。

classFeatures.name: 守护灵光
entries: 从6级开始，每当你或一个距离你10呎内的友善生物必须进行一次豁免检定，该生物在该豁免检定中获得等同于你魅力调整值的加值（最少为+1）。你必须要意识清醒才能提供这个加值。
在18级时，这道灵光的范围增加至30呎。

classFeatures.name: 神圣誓言能力
entries: 在7级时，你获得一个由你神圣誓言所赋予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 属性值提升
entries: 当你在此职业升至8级时，你可以增加一项自选属性值2点，或着你可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。如同平常一样，你不能透过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。
如果你的DM允许使用专长的话，你也可以改为获得一个{@5etools 专长|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 勇气灵光
entries: 从10级开始，你和任何距离你10呎内的友善生物不会在你意识清醒的时候陷入{@condition 恐惧}。
在18级时，这道灵光的范围增加至30呎。

classFeatures.name: 强化至圣斩
entries: 从11级起，你是如此的充满公义之力，以至于你的所有近战武器打击都带着神圣的能量。每当你使用一把近战武器命中一个生物，该生物将受到额外的{@dice 1d8}光耀伤害。

classFeatures.name: 属性值提升
entries: 当你在此职业升至12级时，你可以增加一项自选属性值2点，或着你可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。如同平常一样，你不能透过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。
如果你的DM允许使用专长的话，你也可以改为获得一个{@5etools 专长|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 净化之触
entries: 从14级开始，你可以使用你的动作以结束一个作用于你自己或一个你所碰触自愿生物的法术。
你可以使用这个能力的次数等同于你的魅力调整值（最少一次）。你在完成一次长休后恢复所有你花费掉的次数。

classFeatures.name: 神圣誓言能力
entries: 在15级时，你获得一个由你神圣誓言所赋予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 属性值提升
entries: 当你在此职业升至16级时，你可以增加一项自选属性值2点，或着你可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。如同平常一样，你不能透过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。
如果你的DM允许使用专长的话，你也可以改为获得一个{@5etools 专长|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 灵光强化
entries: 在18级时，你的灵光的范围增加至30呎。

classFeatures.name: 属性值提升
entries: 当你在此职业升至19级时，你可以增加一项自选属性值2点，或着你可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。如同平常一样，你不能透过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。
如果你的DM允许使用专长的话，你也可以改为获得一个{@5etools 专长|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 神圣誓言能力
entries: 在20级时，你获得一个由你神圣誓言所赋予的能力。

subclassFeatures.name: 远古之誓
entries: 远古之誓就和精灵种族、以及德鲁伊的教仪一样古老。那些立下此圣誓的圣骑士们有时又被称作「妖精骑士」、「绿之骑士」、「角冠骑士」，他们之所以在宇宙间的正邪之战中投身于光明一方以对抗黑暗，是因为他们热爱那存在于世界上的美以及生命，而并不一定是因为心怀荣耀、勇气、和正直信念。他们在盔甲和服饰上饰以树叶、鹿角、花朵等等生机勃勃物品的纹样，以反映他们保护世界上的生命和光明的承诺。

entries.name: 远古之信条
entries: 远古之誓的信条已经被传承了无数个世纪。这个誓言强调善良的准则高于一切秩序和混乱。它的四个核心准则相当单纯。

entries.name: 点燃光明
entries: 透过你慈悯、和善、和宽恕的行动，在世界中点燃希望之光，让绝望在你面前退散。

entries.name: 守护明光
entries: 世界上何处有善、美、爱、和欢笑，你就起身对抗那将吞噬它们的邪恶。何处有繁盛兴旺的生命，你就起身对抗那将使之归于贫瘠的力量。

entries.name: 维持己身光辉
entries: 欣喜于歌声和欢笑，悦乐于美和艺术。若你让自己心中的光明殒落，你就无法保护世上的光明。

entries.name: 成为真光
entries: 成为绝望者眼中的辉煌明灯。在你的所有行为中都闪耀出乐观和勇气的光辉。

entries.name: 圣誓法术
entries: 你在下列圣骑士等级时获得相应的圣誓法术。

entries.caption: 远古之誓法术
rows: {@spell 诱捕打击}, {@spell 动物交谈术}
{@spell 植物滋长}, {@spell 防护能量}

entries.name: 引导神力：自然之怒
entries: 你可以使用你的引导神力并唤起原初之力以捕缚一个敌人。以一个动作，你可以让灵体藤蔓生长而出并缠向一个距离你10呎内，且你所能看见的生物。该生物必须成功通过一次力量或敏捷豁免（由它选择），否则陷入{@condition 束缚}状态。当被这些藤蔓{@condition 束缚}时，该生物将在每个它的回合结束时重复此豁免检定。若豁免成功，则它将挣脱束缚，且这些藤蔓也将消失。

entries.name: 引导神力：驱散无信者
entries: 你可以使用你的引导神力以喊出一句将让听到的精类和邪魔都感到痛苦的祷言。以一个动作，你展现你的圣徽，且每个距离你30呎内且能听见你的精类或邪魔都必须进行一次感知豁免。若豁免失败，该生物将被驱散长达1分钟或直到它受到伤害。
一个被驱散的精类和邪魔必须用它的回合尝试尽可能的远离你，且它无法自愿的移动到距离你30呎内的空间。它无法采取反应。它的动作只能使用{@action 疾走}动作或尝试挣脱阻止它移动的效果。若它无法移动，则该生物将使用{@action 闪避}动作。
若该生物的真实型态因为幻象、变形、或其他效果而被遮蔽，则它的真实型态将在它被驱散时被揭露。

entries.name: 防护灵光
entries: 从7级开始，眷顾着你的远古魔法是如此强大，以至于在你身上形成了可畏的防护。你和距离你10呎内的友善生物都将获得对法术伤害的抗性。
在18级时，这个灵光的范围将增加至30呎。

entries.name: 不朽卫士
entries: 从15级开始，当你的生命值被归零且没有被当场杀死时，你可以选择改为将生命值减少至1。一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次长休之前你都不能再使用它。
此外，你将免受任何衰老的弊害，且你不会被魔法变老。

entries.name: 远古斗士
entries: 在20级时，你可以变作大自然远古力量化身的型态，获得你所选择的外貌特征。举例来说，你的肌肤可能会变成绿色或呈现树皮般的质地、你的头发可能会变得如树叶或青苔一般、或者你可能会长出鹿角或狮子般的鬃毛。
使用你的动作，你将经历这个变化过程。在接下来1分钟内，你将获得下列好处：

items: 在你的每个回合开始时，你回复10点生命值。
每当你施放一个施法时间为一个动作的圣骑士法术，你可以改为以你的附赠动作施放它。
距离你10呎内的敌对生物将在对抗你圣骑士法术和引导神力选项的豁免检定中具有劣势。

entries: 一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次长休之前你都不能再使用它。

subclassFeatures.name: 奉献之誓
entries: 奉献之誓约束着圣骑士遵从正义、美德、和秩序中最崇高的理念。那些立下此圣誓的圣骑士们有时又被称作「骑兵」、「白骑士」、或「圣战士」，他们的行为举止符合骑士的完美典范：身着闪亮的盔甲、行为中带着荣耀，并追寻着公正和大义。这些圣骑士用最高的道德标准要求自己，而其中一些人，无论好坏，也以相同的标准去要求其他人。许多立下此圣誓的圣骑士都献身于守序和善良之神，并以他们神祇的戒律衡量他们奉献的程度。他们将天使—完美的至善侍从—视作他们的理想，并在头盔或盾徽上饰以天使羽翼的形象。

entries.name: 奉献之信条
entries: 尽管奉献之誓的实际内容和限制各有不同，但立下此誓的圣骑士都共有以下这些信条。

entries.name: 诚实
entries: 不要说谎或欺诈。你言出必行。

entries.name: 勇气
entries: 尽管谨慎是明智的，但绝不可畏惧行动。

entries.name: 怜悯
entries: 援助他人，保护弱小，并惩罚恃强凌弱者。怜悯你的敌人，但要以智慧惩治他们。

entries.name: 荣誉
entries: 以公平待人，让你荣誉的行为成为他们的典范。尽力行善，避免造成不必要的伤害。

entries.name: 尽责
entries: 对你的行为和其后果负责，守护那些你负责照顾的人，并遵从你理应服从之人。

entries.name: 圣誓法术
entries: 你在下列圣骑士等级时获得相应的圣誓法术。

entries.caption: 奉献之誓法术
rows: {@spell 次级复原术}, {@spell 诚实之域}
{@spell 希望信标}, {@spell 解除魔法}
{@spell 行动自如术}, {@spell 虔诚守卫}

entries.name: 引导神力：至圣武器
entries: 以一个动作，你可以将正能量注入一把你正持握的武器，使用你的引导神力。在1分钟内，你在使用该武器进行的攻击检定中加入你的魅力调整值（加值最低为+1）。该武器同时将散发出20呎半径的明亮光照和再延伸20呎的微光光照。若该武器原本不是魔法武器，则它将在持续期间变成一把魔法武器。
你可以在你的回合做为任何其他动作的一部份结束这个效果。若你不再持握或携带该武器，或若你陷入{@condition 昏迷}状态，则此效果结束。

entries.name: 引导神力：驱散不洁者
entries: 以一个动作，你展现你的圣徽并说出一句斥责邪魔和不死生物的祷词，使用你的引导神力。每个距离你30呎内且可以看见或听见你的邪魔和不死生物都必须进行一次感知豁免。若豁免失败，该生物将被驱散长达1分钟或直到它受到伤害。
一个被驱散的不死生物必须用它的回合尝试尽可能的远离你，且它无法自愿的移动到距离你30呎内的空间。它无法采取反应。它的动作只能使用{@action 疾走}动作或尝试挣脱阻止它移动的效果。若它无法移动，则该生物将使用{@action 闪避}动作。

entries.name: 奉献灵光
entries: 从7级开始，你和距离你10呎内的友善生物都不会在你意识清醒的时候被{@condition 魅惑}。
在18级时，这个灵光的范围将增加至30呎。

entries.name: 纯净之魂
entries: 从15级开始，你将永远处于{@spell 防护善恶}法术的效果影响。

entries.name: 神圣光轮
entries: 在20级时，以一个动作，你可以放射出一道日光灵光。在1分钟内，你将散发出30呎半径的明亮光照和再延伸30呎的微光光照。
每当一个敌对生物在此明亮光照的范围内开始它的回合，该生物将受到10点光耀伤害。
此外，在持续期间内，你在对抗由邪魔或不死生物所施放法术的豁免检定中具有优势。
一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次长休之前你都不能再使用它。

subclassFeatures.name: 复仇之誓
entries: 复仇之誓是个严肃的承诺，立誓于惩罚那些犯下严重罪行之人。当邪恶势力屠杀无辜的百姓、当全体人民背离了神祇的旨意、当盗贼公会茁壮得太过残暴和强大、或当巨龙横行于乡野—在这种时刻，圣骑士们就会出现，并立下复仇之誓以彰显他们拨乱反正的决心。对这些圣骑士—有时又被称作「复仇者」、或「黑暗骑士」—而言，他们自身的纯洁远不如伸张正义来的重要。

entries.name: 复仇之信条
entries: 复仇之誓的信条对每个圣骑士而言都各有不同，但这些信条全都围绕着以任何必要手段惩罚有过者。高举这些信条的圣骑士甚至愿意牺牲他们的正直以让正义降临在恶者身上，也因此，这些圣骑士的阵营通常会是绝对中立或守序中立。这些信条的核心原则极其简单。

entries.name: 追寻以迎战大恶
entries: 是要追猎誓敌？抑或驱逐小恶？我选择迎战那更大的邪恶。

entries.name: 对恶徒不留慈悲
entries: 寻常敌人可能赢得我的慈悲，但我的誓敌无可怜悯。

entries.name: 为目的不择手段
entries: 我的担忧疑虑永不会阻止我歼灭敌人。

entries.name: 为恶行尽力补偿
entries: 若我的敌人在这世界上造成了破坏，那必是因我没能成功阻止它。我必须帮助那些因其恶行而被伤害的人们。

entries.name: 圣誓法术
entries: 你在下列圣骑士等级时获得相应的圣誓法术。

entries.caption: 复仇之誓法术
rows: {@spell 人类定身术}, {@spell 迷踪步}

entries.name: 引导神力：誓绝仇敌
entries: 以一个动作，你展现你的圣徽并说出斥责的祷词，使用你的引导神力。选择一个距离你60呎内且你所能看见的生物。该生物必须进行一次感知豁免，除非它免疫于{@condition 恐惧}。邪魔和不死生物将在此豁免检定中具有劣势。
若豁免失败，该生物将陷入{@condition 恐惧}长达1分钟，或直到它受到任何伤害。当处于{@condition 恐惧}时，该生物的移动速度归零，且无法得益于任何对它移动速度的加值。
若豁免成功，该生物的移动速度被减半长达1分钟，或直到该生物受到任何伤害。

entries.name: 引导神力：憎恨誓言
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你可以使用你的引导神力，对一个距离你10呎内且你所能看见的生物立下憎恨誓言。你对该生物所进行的攻击检定将具有优势，持续1分钟，或直到它的生命值归零或陷入{@condition 昏迷}状态。

entries.name: 无尽复仇
entries: 从7级起，你的超常专注将协助你阻止敌人撤退。当你以一次借机攻击命中一个生物时，你可以在攻击之后做为该反应的一部份，立刻移动最多等同于你移动速度一半的距离。这个移动并不会引发借机攻击。

entries.name: 报复之魂
entries: 从15级开始，你立下憎恨誓言时所带有的权威将赋予你更强的力量以对抗你的敌人。当一个处于你憎恨誓言效果下的生物进行一次攻击，若该生物处于你的近战武器攻击范围内，你可以使用你的反应以对它进行一次近战武器攻击。

entries.name: 复仇天使
entries: 在20级时，你可以变作天使般复仇者的型态。使用你的动作，你将经历这个变化过程。在接下来1小时内，你将获得下列好处：

items: 你的背上将长出双翼，并赋予你60呎的飞行速度。
你将散发出30呎半径的威吓灵光。任何敌对生物在第一次进入这道灵光、或在战斗期间于该处开始它回合时，该生物都必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则因你而陷入{@condition 恐惧}长达1分钟，或直到它受到任何伤害。对该被{@condition 恐惧}生物所进行的攻击检定将具有优势。

entries: 一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次长休之前你都不能再使用它。

subclassFeatures.name: 破誓者
entries: 成为破誓者的圣骑士打破了自己的神圣誓言，而去追求黑暗的野心或为邪恶力量服务。圣骑士心中燃烧的光耀已经熄灭，只剩下一片黑暗。
只有至少达到3级的邪恶圣骑士才能成为一名破誓者。该圣骑士将用破誓者特性替换其所有对应神圣哲言的特性。

entries.name: 破誓者法术
entries: 你会在列出的圣骑士等级获得破誓者法术。

entries.caption: 破誓者法术
rows: {@spell 炼狱叱喝}, {@spell 造成伤势}

entries.name: 破誓者引导神力：控制亡灵
entries: 以一个动作，该圣骑士指定其身边30尺内一个他能看见的不死生物。该目标必须进程一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，该目标必须在随后的24小时里遵从该圣骑士的命令，或者直至该圣骑士在此使用该引导神力选项为止。挑战等级等于或高于该圣骑士等级的不死生物免疫该效应。

entries.name: 破誓者引导神力：恐怖显现
entries: 以一个动作，该圣骑士引导最黑暗的情感并将其凝聚爆发为一场魔法的胁迫之息。该圣骑士周边30尺内，其指定的每个能看到该圣骑士的生物必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败的目标将陷入1分钟对该圣骑士恐慌的状态。因该效应陷入恐慌的生物如果在距离该圣骑士30尺外的位置结束其自己回合，则其可以尝试再进行一次该感知豁免，豁免成功则终止其自己身上的该效应。

entries.name: 憎恨灵光
entries: 第7级起，该圣骑士本身，以及其身边10尺内的所有邪魔和不死生物，都将获的与该圣骑士魅力调整值相同(至少为+1)的近战武器伤害掷般加值。一个生物一次只能从一名圣骑士的该特性中获益。
第18级时，该灵光的覆盖范围增加至30尺。

entries.name: 超然抗性
entries: 第15级时，该圣骑士获得对非魔法武器的钝击、刺穿、挥砍伤害的抗性。

entries.name: 恐惧之王
entries: 第20级时，以一个动作，该圣骑士可以使自己在1分钟内环绕于阴郁的灵光中。该灵光可以将该圣骑士周边30尺半径的亮光光照减弱为微光光照。任何受该圣骑士恐慌的敌人在该灵光内开始其自己回合时将受到4d10的心灵伤害。此外，该圣骑士以及由其指定的身处灵光中的生物都将笼罩于更深的幽影中。依赖视觉的生物对笼罩于该幽影中的生物发动攻击检定时具有劣势。
灵光持续时，该圣骑士可以在其自己回合内用一个附赠动作令该灵光内的幽影攻击一个生物。该圣骑士对该目标发动一次近战法术攻击。若攻击命中，则该目标受到的黯蚀伤害等于3d10+该圣骑士的魅力调整值。
激活该灵光后，该圣骑士必须完成一次长休才能再次使用该特性。

subclassFeatures.name: 王冠之誓
entries: 王冠之誓是一种对于文明理想的宣誓，无论是对国家精神的认同、对君王的效忠、或是对律法和统治之神的奉侍。立下王冠之誓的圣武士们致力于服务社会，尤其是那维系着社会的法律。这些圣骑士们是城墙上警醒的守卫，挺身对抗那威胁于摧毁文明世界的野蛮混乱浪潮；他们通常被称作守护者、典范者、或是哨卫。通常，立下这个誓言的圣骑士会是效忠于国家或者君王的骑士团中的成员，而接受这个誓言也是他们加入骑士团阶级的一部分条件。

entries.name: 王冠之信条
entries: 王冠之誓的信条通常是由其宣誓效忠的君王所设立，但一般而言这些信条都会强调着下列几项。

entries.name: 律法
entries: 律法至上。它是文明的基石，且必须被敬重。

entries.name: 忠诚
entries: 言出必行。失去了忠诚，誓言和律法将毫无意义。

entries.name: 勇气
entries: 无所畏惧。你必须自愿为了秩序挺身而出，即使胜算渺茫。如果你不行动，又有谁会呢？

entries.name: 责任
entries: 恪尽职守。你必须为你的行动承担后果，且你有责任去实现你的使命和义务。

entries.name: 圣誓法术
entries: 你在下列圣骑士等级时获得相应的圣誓法术。

entries.caption: 王冠之誓法术
rows: {@spell 守护联结}, {@spell 诚实之域}
{@spell 活力灵光}, {@spell 灵体守卫}

entries.name: 引导神力：捍卫挑战
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你发起一个挑战以强迫其他生物与你战斗。每个距离你30呎内你所选且你能看见的生物必须进行一次感知豁免。若豁免失败，该生物将无法自愿移动到距离你超过30呎范围的位置。这个效果对该生物的影响会在你陷入{@condition 无力}状态或死亡、或该生物距离你超过30呎时提早结束。

entries.name: 引导神力：扭转局势
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你可以用你的引导神力援助重伤的生物。每个距离你30呎内你所选且能听见你的生物若只有不超过一半的生命值，则将回复等同于{@dice 1d6}+你的魅力调整值（至少为1）的生命值。

entries.name: 神圣忠诚
entries: 从7级开始，当一个距离你5呎内的生物受到伤害，你可以使用你的反应以魔法性地让你的生命值代替该目标生物，使该生物不受伤害。取而代之，你受到该伤害。这个对你造成的伤害无法被任何方式减轻或避免。

entries.name: 不屈之魂
entries: 从15级开始，你在用于避免被{@condition 麻痹}或{@condition 震慑}的豁免检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 崇高卫士
entries: 在20级时，你在战场上的姿态对那些致力于你事业的人们而言是一种强大的鼓舞。你可以使用你的动作以获得下列好处长达1小时：

items: 你对非魔法武器所造成的钝击、穿刺、劈砍伤害具有抗性。
你的盟友在处于你30呎范围内时在死亡豁免中具有优势。
你以及距离你30呎内的盟友在感知豁免中具有优势。

entries: 这个效果会在你陷入{@condition 无力}状态或死亡时提早结束。一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次长休之前你都不能再使用它。

subclassFeatures.name: Oath of Conquest
entries: The Oath of Conquest calls to paladins who seek glory in battle and the subjugation of their enemies. It isn't enough for these paladins to establish order. They must crush the forces of chaos. Sometimes called knight tyrants or iron mongers, those who swear this oath gather into grim orders that serve gods or philosophies of war and well-ordered might. Some of these paladins go so far as to consort with the powers of the Nine Hells. The archdevil Bel, warlord of Avernus, counts many of these paladins called hell knights as his most ardent supporters. Hell knights cover their armor with trophies taken from fallen enemies, a grim warning to any who dare oppose them and the decrees of their lords.

entries.name: Tenets of Conquest
entries: A paladin who takes this oath has the tenets of conquest seared on the upper arm. A hell knight's oath appears in Infernal runes, a brutal reminder of vows to the Lords of Hell.

entries.name: Douse the Flame of Hope
entries: It is not enough to merely defeat an enemy in battle. Your victory must be so overwhelming that your enemies will to fight is shattered forever. A blade can end a life. Fear can end an empire.

entries.name: Rule with an Iron Fist
entries: Once you have conquered, tolerate no dissent. Your word is law. Those who obey it shall be favored. Those who defy it shall be punished as an example to all who might follow.

entries.name: Strength Above All
entries: You shall rule until a stronger one arises. Then you must grow mightier and meet the challenge, or fall to your own ruin.

entries.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.

entries.caption: Oath of Conquest Spells
rows: {@spell 艾嘉西斯之铠}, {@spell 命令术}
{@spell 人类定身术}, {@spell 灵体武器}

entries.name: Channel Divinity: Conquering Strike
entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to break a foe's will. When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack as part of the {@action Attack} action, you can also use your Channel Divinity to force the target to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to strike with supernatural accuracy. When you make an attack roll, you can use your Channel Divinity to gain a +10 bonus to the roll. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the attack hits or misses.

entries.name: Aura of Conquest
entries: Starting at 7th level, you emanate a menacing aura while you're not {@condition incapacitated}. The aura includes your space, extends 10 feet from you in every direction, and is blocked by total cover. Any enemy in the aura has disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.
At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

entries.name: Implacable Spirit
entries: Once you reach 15th level, you can no longer be {@condition charmed}.

entries.name: Invincible Conqueror
entries: At 20th level, you gain the ability to harness extraordinary martial prowess. As an action, you can magically become an avatar of conquest, gaining the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: You have resistance to all damage.
When you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can make one additional attack as part of that action.
Your melee weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

entries: Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

The archdevil Bel, warlord of Avernus, counts many of these paladins—called hell knights—as his most ardent supporters. Hell knights cover their armor with trophies taken from fallen enemies, a grim warning to any who dare oppose them and the decrees of their lords. These knights are often most fiercely resisted by other paladins of this oath, who believe that the hell knights have wandered too far into darkness.

entries.name: Channel Divinity: Conquering Presence
entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to exude a terrifying presence. As an action, you force each creature of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to strike with supernatural accuracy. When you make an attack roll, you can use your Channel Divinity to gain a +10 bonus to the roll. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the DM says whether the attack hits or misses.

entries.name: Aura of Conquest
entries: Starting at 7th level, you constantly emanate a menacing aura while you're not {@condition incapacitated}. The aura includes your space, extends 10 feet from you in every direction, and is blocked by total cover.

If a creature is {@condition frightened} of you, its speed is reduced to 0 while in the aura, and that creature takes psychic damage equal to half your paladin level if it starts its turn there. At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

entries.name: Scornful Rebuke
entries: Starting at 15th level, those who dare to strike you are psychically punished for their audacity. Whenever a creature hits you with an attack, that creature takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 0) if you're not {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Invincible Conqueror
entries: At 20th level, you gain the ability to harness extraordinary martial prowess. As an action, you can magically become an avatar of conquest, gaining the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: You have resistance to all damage.
When you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can make one additional attack as part of that action.
Your melee weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

entries: Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeatures.name: Oath of Treachery
entries: The Oath of Treachery is the path followed by paladins who have forsworn other oaths or who care only for their own power and survival. Commonly known as blackguards, these profane warriors are faithful only to themselves. Anyone desperate enough to follow one of these paladins does so because, while deceitful, these paladins command great power. Those who follow them without falling prey to their treachery hope to indulge in wanton violence and accumulate great treasure. Many of these paladins pay homage to demon lords, especially Grazz't and Orcus. Even the Lords of Hell are loath to ally with these champions of chaos, but sometimes Baalzebul and Glasya find a kindred spirit in a blackguard's penchant for double dealing and treachery.

entries.name: Tenets of Treachery
entries: A paladin who embraces the Oath of Treachery owes allegiance to no one. There are no tenets of this oath, for it lacks any substance. Those who are unfortunate enough to have close contact with blackguards have observed that a blackguard's overwhelming concern is power and safety, especially if both can be obtained at the expense of others.

entries.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.

entries.caption: Oath of Treachery Spells
rows: {@spell 魅惑人类}, {@spell 脚底抹油}
{@spell 困惑术}, {@spell 高等隐形术}

entries.name: Channel Divinity: Conjure Duplicate
entries: As an action, you create a visual illusion of yourself that lasts for 1 minute, or until you lose your concentration (as if you were concentrating on a spell). The illusion appears in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you. The illusion looks exactly like you; it is silent; it is your size, is insubstantial, doesn't occupy its space; and it is unaffected by attacks and damage. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the illusion up to 30 feet to a space you can see, but the illusion must remain within 120 feet of you.

For the duration, you can cast spells as though you were in the illusion's space, but you must use your own senses. Additionally, when both you and your illusion are within 5 feet of a creature that can see the illusion, you have advantage on attack rolls against that creature, given how uncanny the illusion is.

entries.name: Channel Divinity: Poison Strike
entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to make a weapon deadlier. As a bonus action, you touch one weapon or piece of ammunition and conjure a special poison on it. The poison lasts for 1 minute. The next time you hit a target with an attack using that weapon or ammunition, the target takes poison damage immediately after the attack. The poison damage equals {@dice 2d10} + your paladin level, or 20 + your paladin level if you had advantage on the attack roll.

entries.name: Aura of Treachery
entries: Starting at 7th level, you emanate an aura of discord, which gives you the following benefits.

entries.name: Cull the Herd
entries: You have advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that has one or more of its allies within 5 feet of it.

entries.name: Treacherous Strike
entries: If a creature within 5 feet of you misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to force the attacker to reroll that attack against a creature of your choice that is also within 5 feet of the attacker. The ability fails and is wasted if the attacker is immune to being {@condition charmed}.
You can use this ability three times. You regain expended uses of it when you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Blackguard's Escape
entries: At 15th level, you have the ability to slip away from your foes. Immediately after you are hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to turn {@condition invisible} and teleport up to 60 feet to a spot you can see. You remain {@condition invisible} until the end of your next turn or until you attack, deal damage, or force a creature to make a saving throw. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

entries.name: Icon of Deceit
entries: At 20th level, you gain the ability to emanate feelings of treachery. As an action, you can magically become an avatar of deceit, gaining the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: You are {@condition invisible}.

If a creature damages you on its turn, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to your spell save DC) or you control its next action, provided that you aren't {@condition incapacitated} when it takes the action. A creature automatically succeeds on the save if the creature is immune to being {@condition charmed}.
If you have advantage on an attack roll, you gain a bonus to its damage roll equal to your paladin level.

entries: Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeatures.name: Oath of Redemption
entries: The Oath of Redemption sets a paladin on a difficult path, one that requires a holy warrior to use violence only as a last resort. Paladins who dedicate themselves to this oath believe that any person can be redeemed and that the path of benevolence and justice is one that anyone can walk. These paladins face evil creatures in the hope of turning them to the light, and the paladins slay them only when such a deed will clearly save other lives. Paladins who follow this path are known as redeemers.

While redeemers are idealists, they are no fools. Redeemers know that undead, demons, devils, and other supernatural threats can be inherently evil. Against such foes, the paladins bring the full wrath of their weapons and spells to bear. Yet the redeemers still pray that, one day, even creatures of wickedness will invite their own redemption.

entries.name: Tenets of Redemption
entries: The tenets of the Oath of Redemption hold a paladin to a high standard of peace and justice.

entries.name: Peace
entries: Violence is a weapon of last resort. Diplomacy and understanding are the paths to long-lasting peace.

entries.name: Innocence
entries: All people begin life in an innocent state, and it is their environment or the influence of dark forces that drives them to evil. By setting the proper example, and working to heal the wounds of a deeply flawed world, you can set anyone on a righteous path.

entries.name: Patience
entries: Change takes time. Those who have walked the path of the wicked must be given reminders to keep them honest and true. Once you have planted the seed of righteousness in a creature, you must work day after day to allow it to survive and then flourish.

entries.name: Wisdom
entries: Your heart and mind must stay clear, for eventually you will be forced to admit defeat. While every creature can be redeemed, some are so far along the path of evil that you have no choice but to end their lives for the greater good. Any such action must be carefully weighed and the consequences fully understood, but once you have made the decision, follow through with it knowing your path is just.

entries.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.

rows: {@spell 人类定身术}, {@spell 衰弱射线}
{@spell 反制法术}, {@spell 催眠图纹}
{@spell 欧提路克魔封法球}, {@spell 石肤术}
{@spell 怪物定身术}, {@spell 力墙术}

entries.name: Armor of Peace
entries: Starting at 3rd level, your commitment to peace allows you to walk into the most dangerous situations unarmored. While you aren't wearing armor or wielding a shield, your base AC is 16 + your Dexterity modifier.

entries.name: Warrior of Reconciliation
entries: At 3rd level, you foreswear the weapons of war in favor of simple tools. While wielding a simple weapon that deals bludgeoning damage, you gain a special benefit if you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with that weapon and decide to spare the creature's life. Instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, the creature is {@condition charmed} by you for 1 minute. During that time, the {@condition charmed} creature is peaceful and docile, refusing to move or to take actions or reactions, unless you command it to. You can't order the creature to attack, force someone to make a saving throw, or cause damage to itself or others. This {@condition charmed} effect ends early if you are {@condition incapacitated} or if you or your companions attack the creature, deal damage to it, or force it to make a saving throw. When the effect ends, the creature falls {@condition unconscious} if it still has 0 hit points.

entries.name: Channel Divinity: Emissary of Peace
entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to augment your presence with divine power. As a bonus action, you grant yourself a +5 bonus to the next Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check you make within the next minute.

entries.name: Channel Divinity: Rebuke the Violent
entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to rebuke those who use violence. As a reaction when an enemy within 10 feet of you deals damage with a melee attack against one creature other than you, you force that attacker to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker takes radiant damage equal to the damage it just dealt. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

entries.name: Aura of the Guardian
entries: Starting at 7th level, you can shield your allies from harm at the cost of your own health. As a reaction when an ally within 10 feet of you takes damage, you instead magically take that damage. This feature doesn't transfer any other effects that might accompany the damage.

entries.name: Protective Spirit
entries: Starting at 15th level, a holy presence mends your wounds in combat. You regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} + half your paladin level if you end your turn in combat with fewer than half of your hit points remaining and you aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Emissary of Redemption
entries: At 20th level, you become an avatar of peace, which gives you two benefits:

items: You have resistance to all damage dealt by other creatures (their attacks, spells, and other effects).
Whenever a creature damages you, it takes damage equal to half the amount it dealt to you.

entries: If you attack a creature, deal damage to it, or force it to make a saving throw, neither benefit works against that creature until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeatures.name: 征服之誓
entries: 征服之誓吸引着那些在战斗中寻求荣耀与征服的圣骑士们。对这些圣骑士而言仅仅建立秩序是不够的，他们必须彻底粉碎混乱的势力。有时候又被称作暴君骑士或战争贩子，他们集结成严酷的军队或组织，以服侍战争之神或哲学、以及秩序良好的力量。
其中一些这类圣骑士甚至会误入歧途，与九狱同流合污，重视律法规则更胜过仁慈慰藉。大恶魔巴尔，阿弗纳斯地狱的军阀，将许多这样的圣骑士—他们被称为地狱骑士—视为祂最忠诚的追随者。地狱骑士用倒下的敌人身上的战利品来装饰他们的盔甲，做为对任何敢于反抗他们以及他们领主法令的人的可怕警告。这些骑士往往会受到其他征服之誓圣骑士的强烈抵制，他们认为地狱骑士已经在黑暗中走得太远了。

entries.name: 征服之信条
entries: 立下征服之誓的圣骑士会将征服之信条烙印在他们的上臂。

entries.name: 熄灭希望之火
entries: 仅仅在战斗中击败敌人是不够的。你的压倒性胜利必须显著到足以永远粉碎敌人的战斗意志。刀剑只能结束生命，恐惧却能终结国家。

entries.name: 以铁腕统治
entries: 一旦你完成征服，不要容忍任何异议。你的话语就是法律。那些遵循你的人将被优待，那些反抗你的人则会受到惩罚，以儆效尤。

entries.name: 力量高于一切
entries: 你将维持统治直到更强的势力崛起。那时你必须变得更强大以迎接挑战，否则就会自取灭亡。

entries.name: 圣誓法术
entries: 你在下列圣骑士等级时获得相应的圣誓法术。

entries.caption: 征服之誓法术
rows: {@spell 艾嘉西斯之铠}, {@spell 命令术}
{@spell 人类定身术}, {@spell 灵体武器}

entries.name: 引导神力：征服威仪
entries: 你可以使用你的引导神力以展现出骇人的威仪。以一个动作，你强迫每个距离你30呎内你所选且你能看见的生物进行一次感知豁免。若豁免失败，该生物将因你而陷入{@condition 恐惧}长达1分钟。陷入{@condition 恐惧}的生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复此豁免，若豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。

entries.name: 引导神力：神导打击
entries: 你可以使用你的引导神力以超常准确度进行打击。当你进行一次攻击检定时，你可以使用你的引导神力以在该检定中获得+10的加值。你在看见掷骰结果之后，但DM说出攻击是否命中之前决定是否使用此能力。

entries.name: 征服灵光
entries: 从7级开始，你将在不处于{@condition 无力}状态时持续散发出威吓灵光。这道灵光从你身上向各个方向延伸10呎，但并不会穿透全掩护。
若一个生物{@condition 恐惧}于你，则它的移动速度将在处于这道灵光时被归零，且该生物将在它于该处开始它的回合时受到等同于你圣骑士等级一半的精神伤害。
在18级时，这个灵光的范围将增加至30呎。

entries.name: 轻蔑斥喝
entries: 从15级开始，那些胆敢攻击你的人们将因他们的放肆而遭受精神上的惩罚。每当一个生物以一次攻击命中你时，若你并未{@condition 无力}，则该生物将受到等同于你魅力调整值（最少为1）的精神伤害。

entries.name: 无敌征服者
entries: 在20级时，你获得驾驭卓越武艺的能力。以一个动作，你可以魔法性地变成征服的化身，在接下来1分钟内获得下列好处：

items: 你对所有伤害具有抗性。
当你在你的回合采取{@action 攻击}动作时，你可以做为该动作的一部份额外再进行一次攻击。
你的近战武器攻击将在{@dice d20}的结果骰出19或20时造成重击。

entries: 一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次长休之前你都不能再使用它。

subclassFeatures.name: 救赎之誓
entries: 救赎之誓为圣骑士设立了一条艰难的道路：要求这名神圣战士只能在最后关头使用暴力。献身于救赎之誓的圣骑士们相信任何人都可以得到救赎，且所有人都可以走在仁慈与正义的道路上。这些圣骑士直面邪恶的生物，希望能使他们的敌人弃暗投明。且除非这么做很明显能拯救其他性命，否则他们绝不会杀死自己的敌人。遵循这条道路的圣骑士们也被称作救赎者。
尽管救赎者身为理想主义者，他们也并不是傻瓜。救赎者也明白不死生物、恶魔、魔鬼、和其他超自然威胁天性邪恶。在面对这类敌人时，立下这个誓言的圣骑士们随时准备用武器和法术来击垮它们。尽管如此，救赎者们仍在心底祈祷着，希望总有一天，即使是这些邪恶生物也能得到它们的救赎。

entries.name: 救赎之信条
entries: 救赎之誓的信条要求圣骑士维持着高标准的和平与正义。

entries.name: 和平
entries: 暴力是最后的手段。交流和理解才是实现长久和平的途径。

entries.name: 无辜
entries: 所有人生来都是清白无罪的，而驱使他们走向邪恶的往往是他们周遭的环境或黑暗力量的影响。透过树立正确的榜样，并治愈这个残缺世界的创伤，你可以令任何人走上正确的道路。

entries.name: 耐心
entries: 改变需要时间。那些犯下罪行的人必须被时刻提醒保持诚实与真诚。一旦你在生物心中种下正义的种子，你就必须日复一日地为其努力，以让它得以开花结果。

entries.name: 睿智
entries: 你的心灵必须时刻保持清醒，理解你最终也许会被迫承认失败。尽管所有生物都可以得到救赎，那有些人却已在邪恶的路上行走的太远，以至于你别无选择，只能为了大义将其剿灭。任何这类行动都应当经过仔细权衡．并考虑清楚其后果，然而你一旦做出决定，就得坚持下去。

entries: 你在下列圣骑士等级时获得相应的圣誓法术。

entries.name: 引导神力：和平使者
entries: 你可以使用你的引导神力以利用神性力量增强你的威仪。以一个附赠动作，你让自己在接下来的10分钟内所进行的魅力（{@skill 说服}）检定获得+5加值。

entries.name: 引导神力：斥喝暴力
entries: 你可以使用你的引导神力以斥喝那些使用暴力的人们。紧接在一个距离你30呎内的攻击者以一次攻击对你以外的生物造成伤害后，你可以使用你的反应以强迫该攻击者进行一次感知豁免。若豁免失败，该攻击者将受到等同于它刚才造成伤害数值的光耀伤害。若豁免成功，则它只受到一半的伤害。

entries.name: 护卫灵光
entries: 从7级开始，你能够以自己的健康为代价保护盟友不受伤害。当一个距离你10呎内的生物受到伤害，你可以使用你的反应以用魔法代替该生物承受该伤害。这个能力并不会转移任何其他可能伴随着伤害的效果，且这个伤害无法被任何方式减轻。
在18级时，这个灵光的范围将增加至30呎。

entries.name: 守护之魂
entries: 从15级开始，神圣存在将在战斗中治愈你的伤势。若你在战斗中以少于生命值一半的状况结束你的回合，且不处于{@condition 无力}状态，则你将回复等同于{@dice 1d6}+你圣骑士等级一半的生命值。

entries.name: 救赎使者
entries: 在20级时，你将成为和平的化身，并赋予你下列二个好处：

items: 你对所有其他生物所造成的伤害（它们的攻击、法术、和其他效果）具有抗性。
每当一个生物以一次攻击命中你，它将受到等同于你从该攻击受到伤害的一半的光耀伤害。

entries: 若你攻击一个生物、对它施放法术、或以任何这个能力以外的方式对它造成伤害，则直到你完成一次长休之前，这两个好处对该生物都不会产生作用。

Clad in plate armor that gleams in the sunlight despite the dust and grime of long travel, a human lays down her sword and shield and places her hands on a mortally wounded man. Divine radiance shines from her hands, the man's wounds knit closed, and his eyes open wide with amazement.

A dwarf crouches behind an outcrop, his black cloak making him nearly invisible in the night, and watches an orc war band celebrating its recent victory. Silently, he stalks into their midst and whispers an oath, and two orcs are dead before they even realize he is there.

Silver hair shining in a shaft of light that seems to illuminate only him, an elf laughs with exultation. His spear flashes like his eyes as he jabs again and again at a twisted giant, until at last his light overcomes its hideous darkness.

Whatever their origin and their mission, paladins are united by their oaths to stand against the forces of evil. Whether sworn before a god's altar and the witness of a priest, in a sacred glade before nature spirits and fey beings, or in a moment of desperation and grief with the dead as the only witness, a paladin's oath is a powerful bond. It is a source of power that turns a devout warrior into a blessed champion.

entries.name: The Cause of Righteousness
entries: A paladin swears to uphold justice and righteousness, to stand with the good things of the world against the encroaching darkness, and to hunt the forces of evil wherever they lurk. Different paladins focus on various aspects of the cause of righteousness, but all are bound by the oaths that grant them power to do their sacred work. Although many paladins are devoted to gods of good, a paladin's power comes as much from a commitment to justice itself as it does from a god.

Paladins train for years to learn the skills of combat, mastering a variety of weapons and armor. Even so, their martial skills are secondary to the magical power they wield: power to heal the sick and injured, to smite the wicked and the undead, and to protect the innocent and those who join them in the fight for justice.

entries.name: Beyond the Mundane Life
entries: Almost by definition, the life of a paladin is an adventuring life. Unless a lasting injury has taken him or her away from adventuring for a time, every paladin lives on the front lines of the cosmic struggle against evil. Fighters are rare enough among the ranks of the militias and armies of the world, but even fewer people can claim the true calling of a paladin. When they do receive the call, these warriors turn from their former occupations and take up arms to fight evil. Sometimes their oaths lead them into the service of the crown as leaders of elite groups of knights, but even then their loyalty is first to the cause of righteousness, not to crown and country.

Adventuring paladins take their work seriously. A delve into an ancient ruin or dusty crypt can be a quest driven by a higher purpose than the acquisition of treasure. Evil lurks in dungeons and primeval forests, and even the smallest victory against it can tilt the cosmic balance away from oblivion.

entries.name: Creating a Paladin
entries: The most important aspect of a paladin character is the nature of his or her holy quest. Although the class features related to your oath don't appear until you reach 3rd level, plan ahead for that choice by reading the oath descriptions at the end of the class. Are you a devoted servant of good, loyal to the gods of justice and honor, a holy knight in shining armor venturing forth to smite evil? Are you a glorious champion of the light, cherishing everything beautiful that stands against the shadow, a knight whose oath descends from traditions older than many of the gods? Or are you an embittered loner sworn to take vengeance on those who have done great evil, sent as an angel of death by the gods or driven by your need for revenge? Appendix B lists many deities worshiped by paladins throughout the multiverse, such as Torm, Tyr, Heironeous, Paladine, Kiri-Jolith, Dol Arrah, the Silver Flame, Bahamut, Athena, Re-Horakhty, and Heimdall.

How did you experience your call to serve as a paladin? Did you hear a whisper from an unseen god or angel while you were at prayer? Did another paladin sense the potential within you and decide to train you as a squire? Or did some terrible event—the destruction of your home, perhaps—drive you to your quests? Perhaps you stumbled into a sacred grove or a hidden elven enclave and found yourself called to protect all such refuges of goodness and beauty. Or you might have known from your earliest memories that the paladin's life was your calling, almost as if you had been sent into the world with that purpose stamped on your soul.

As guardians against the forces of wickedness, paladins are rarely of any evil alignment. Most of them walk the paths of charity and justice. Consider how your alignment colors the way you pursue your holy quest and the manner in which you conduct yourself before gods and mortals. Your oath and alignment might be in harmony, or your oath might represent standards of behavior that you have not yet attained.

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a paladin quickly by following these suggestions. First, Strength should be your highest ability score, followed by Charisma. Second, choose the {@background noble} background.
The true worth of a paladin is measured not in foes defeated or dungeons plundered. It is measured in lives saved and hearts turned to the causes of mercy and justice.

A paladin is a living embodiment of an oath—a promise or a vow made manifest in the person of a holy warrior who has the skill and the determination to see the cause through to the end. Some paladins devote themselves expressly to protecting the innocent and spreading justice in the world, while others resolve to attain that goal by conquering those who stand defiant and bringing them under the rule of law.

Although no paladin in the world could be described as typical, a number of them are narrow-minded do-gooders who refuse to tolerate even the smallest deviation from their own outlook. Paladins who take up the adventuring life, however, rarely remain so rigid in their attitudes—if only to keep from alienating their companions.

You can flesh out your paladin character by using the suggestions below. It's important to keep in mind that most paladins aren't robots. They have doubts and prejudices and harbor contradictory thoughts just as any other character does. Some are compelled by an internal motivation that might sometimes be at odds with the principles of their oaths.

entries.name: Personal Goal
entries: The precepts of a paladin's oath provide purpose to the character and dictate an ultimate goal or an overall intent that the paladin abides by and advances. Aside from that, some paladins are driven by a personal goal that either complements or transcends the dictates of their oaths. Paladins who swear different oaths might have the same personal goal, differing only in how they apply that goal to their actions when upholding their oaths.
If your paladin character has a personal goal, it might be drawn from some life event and thus not directly tied to the oath.

entries.caption: Personal Goal
rows: Peace. You fight so that future generations will not have to.
Revenge. Your oath is the vehicle through which you will right an ancient wrong.
Duty. You will live up to what you have sworn to do, or die trying.
Leadership. You will win a great battle that bards will sing about, and in so doing, you will become an example to inspire others.
Faith. You know your path is righteous, or else the gods would not have set you upon it.
Glory. You will lead the world into a grand new era, one that will be branded with your name.

entries.name: Symbol
entries: Paladins are mindful of the influence of symbols, and many of them adopt or design an artistic device that bears a distinctive image. Your symbol exemplifies the oath you have taken and communicates that message to those around you, friend and foe alike.
Your symbol might be displayed on a banner, a flag, or your clothing for all to see. Or it could be less obvious, such as a trinket or a token that you carry concealed on your person.

entries.caption: Symbol
rows: A dragon, emblematic of your nobility in peace and your ferocity in combat
A clenched fist, because you are always ready to fight for your beliefs
An upraised open hand, indicating your preference for diplomacy over combat
A red heart, showing the world your commitment to justice
A black heart, signifying that emotions such as pity do not sway your dedication to your oath
An unblinking eye, meaning that you are ever alert to all threats against your cause

entries.name: Nemesis
entries: Their adherence to a sacred oath demands that paladins take an active stance in carrying their beliefs into the world. This activity naturally leads to conflict with creatures or entities that oppose those beliefs. Among those opponents, one often stands out as a paladin's most persistent or most formidable foe—a nemesis whose presence or influence is a constant factor in a paladin's life.

Your paladin character might have an enemy that dates from the days before you took up your path. Or you could be a target because when you became a paladin, you immediately attracted the attention of those that would do you in. If you have a nemesis, who or what is it? Whom among your enemies do you consider to be the biggest threat to achieving your goals?

entries.caption: Nemesis
rows: A mighty orc war chief who threatens to overrun and destroy everything you hold sacred
A fiend or a celestial, the agent of a power of the Outer Planes, who has been charged with corrupting or redeeming you, as appropriate
A dragon whose servants dog your steps
A high priest who sees you as a misguided fool and wants you to abandon your religion
A rival paladin who trained with you but became an oath-breaker and holds you responsible
A vampire who has sworn revenge against all paladins after being defeated by one

entries.name: Temptation
entries: Although paladins are dedicated to their oaths, they are mortals, and thus they are flawed. Many of them exhibit a type of behavior or hold to an attitude that is not in keeping with the highest ideals of their calling.
What is the temptation that your character succumbs to or finds it difficult to resist?

entries.caption: Temptation
rows: Fury. When your anger is roused, you have trouble thinking straight, and you fear you might do something you'll regret.
Pride. Your deeds are noteworthy, and no one takes note of them more often than you.
Lust. You can't resist an attractive face and a pleasant smile.
Envy. You are mindful of what some famous folk have accomplished, and you feel inadequate when your deeds don't compare to theirs.
Despair. You consider the great strength of the enemies you must defeat, and at times you see no way to achieve final victory.
Greed. Regardless of how much glory and treasure you amass, it's never enough for you.
